attributes.action: Cancel all A-levels and GCSE exams for 2021
attributes.additional_details: Many students have missed months of learning and are struggling to learn all the content before the exams. Many students are having to self-isolate which means they are missing out on even more learning. Every single student is extremely stressed out about the exams and the pandemic. It’s taking a severe toll on their mental health. Wales has already realised this and have cancelled all of their exams. England must take the same action and cancel exams and allow teacher assessed grades.
attributes.background: All exams should be cancelled and there should teacher assessed grades like the previous year.
